meanings.definition: Involving the study of motion without considering the forces causing it.
meanings.sent1: The kinematical model focused on the trajectory of the projectile.
meanings.sent2: The kinematical study of the pendulum's motion was fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The kinematical experiment simulated motion in a vacuum.
meanings.sent4: Her kinematical analysis revealed the object's path through space.
meanings.sent5: The kinematical observation ignored external influences on the motion.
